messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
Who is the last direct descendant of a line going back to the founding of the town?
The person who died an octogenarian bachelor
You are a helpful assistant.
What has been inventories by the legal firm assigned by the Cobb family?
Papers, including diaries, historical documents, pictures, and artifacts
You are a helpful assistant.
Where were the papers passed on for more professional assessment of their worth and significance?
The Miskatonic
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the understanding regarding the trust of the papers?
That the trust may be repaid with the eventual investiture of a collection or the donation of certain papers
You are a helpful assistant.
Who assigned the papers to be inventoried by a legal firm?
The Cobb family
You are a helpful assistant.
Why were the papers passed to the Miskatonic University?
For more professional assessment of their worth and significance
You are a helpful assistant.
What was the desired outcome of the trust established by the papers?
The eventual investiture of a collection or the donation of certain papers
You are a helpful assistant.
What was Leiter's motivation for wanting the papers assessed?
To receive the prestige that the assessment would bring
You are a helpful assistant.
What prompted Leiter to lobby heavily for the assessment of the papers?
He had pressing ulterior motives for securing the work due to his money running out and creditors threatening repayment.
You are a helpful assistant.
What did Leiter discover among the papers he assessed?
A bound sheaf of previously unknown correspondence and evidentiary materials from the Arkham Witch Trials of the 1690s.
You are a helpful assistant.
How did Leiter initially perceive the value of the documents he discovered?
He thought they were worth a small fortune to the right buyer.
You are a helpful assistant.
What did Leiter later learn was the actual value of the documents he discovered?
Nothing; he was mistaken about their value.
You are a helpful assistant.
What valuable documents did Leiter discover among the papers?
The Witch Trial Papers
You are a helpful assistant.
Who was Leiter's accomplice in trying to forge the Witch Trial Papers?
Cecil Hunter
You are a helpful assistant.
What was the result of Leiter's offer to sell the Witch Trial Papers to potential buyers?
Most of his contacts were poor, except for solicitations from would-be clients with reputations that frightened him
You are a helpful assistant.
What led Leiter to believe he was being followed?
His home was broken into and ransacked
You are a helpful assistant.
What caused Leiter's home to be broken into and ransacked?
He was the center of a bidding war between several clients.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happened to Cecil Hunter after being assigned the task?
He went mad.
You are a helpful assistant.
What ultimately happened to the rest of the papers?
They went missing.
You are a helpful assistant.
What led to Leiter's increasing misgivings about forging the diagrams?
Hunter's own increasing misgivings.
You are a helpful assistant.
When did Leiter's life spiral out of control?
Shortly after Cecil Hunter went mad and the rest of the papers went missing.
You are a helpful assistant.
Who was assigned the task of forging several sets of diagrams?
Cecil Hunter
You are a helpful assistant.
Why did Cecil Hunter go mad?
He went mad due to a sudden spate of horrific nightmares.
You are a helpful assistant.
Where did Leiter return on the evening of the 23rd September?
To his faculty office in the Mis-Katonic University
